page.title: 03DIET IN CARMARTHEN
page.content: Inthe past year there has been an increase in sales of low fat products in the cheese,margarine and dairy products section because it is regarded as healthy eating.The most popular alcholic drink is Whisky followed by Gin then Vodka.THE sales of wine are icreasing and white wine is the most popular.The average shopper who is in the stores doing the weekly shopping takes about one and a half hours. The biggest changes in recent years are in productiuity,computers,stock,order, healthy foods,customers service and scientific stores.
